main: ^Been an interesting couple of years since you were here last
^Hello Darryl, what's changed since I was here last?

c-0: ^I've got a new bakery, and I'm also running for Mayor...

update: ^Yes, I've heard you are running for Mayor.

c-0: ^Before you ask Detective, I can tell you every morning I go to the bakery early to do the morning prep. You can even ask Russel as we work together. We were both there that morning.

alibi: ^Was anyone acting suspicious around that time?

c-0: ^No one was acting suspicious but, if I were you, my suspicions would be on the other 2 running for mayor. I was last in the polls by a long shot. Last I checked, Aaron was coming first with Jonothan a close second and Michael in third.

information: ^Do you think Jonothan had more of a motive to kill Aaron?
^Do you think Michael had more of a motive to kill Aaron?
chosen: ^ was the one who did it. I don't have any supporting evidence but I have a gut feeling that it was him.
^Thank you Darryl. I shall keep that in mind.

c-0: ^I don't want to take up anymore of your time. Have a good one Detective.
